item.title: CVE-2023-4997|2024-08-02T07:44:53.695Z -- prointegra%20s.a. -- uptimedc
item.description: Improper authorisation of regular users in ProIntegra Uptime DC software (versions below 2.0.0.33940) allows them to change passwords of all other users including administrators leading to a privilege escalation.
